senselogic.sitevision.api.resource

Interface ColorUtil


  • @Requireable(value="ColorUtil")
public interface ColorUtil
    Utility interface for Colors.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getColorUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getColorByHtmlHexValue(String aHexString)
      Gets the color with a given html hex value (i.e. a '#' followed by 6 characters [0-9,a-f,A-F]).
      Node getColorByHtmlHexValue(String aHexString, Node aDefaultValue)
      Gets the color with a given html hex value (i.e. a '#' followed by 6 characters [0-9,a-f,A-F]) with a fallback value if no color matches.
      Node getColorByName(String aColorName)
      Gets the color with a given name
      Node getColorByName(String aColorName, Node aDefaultValue)
      Gets the color with a given name with a fallback value if no color matches

    • Method Detail

      • getColorByName

        Node getColorByName(String aColorName)
        Gets the color with a given name
        Parameters:
        aColorName - the name of the font
        Returns:
        the first color with name aColorName, or null if no color matches

      • getColorByName

        Node getColorByName(String aColorName,
                    Node aDefaultValue)
        Gets the color with a given name with a fallback value if no color matches
        Parameters:
        aColorName - the name of the font
        aDefaultValue - fallback value
        Returns:
        the first color with name aColorName, or aDefaultValue if no color matches

      • getColorByHtmlHexValue

        Node getColorByHtmlHexValue(String aHexString)
        Gets the color with a given html hex value (i.e. a '#' followed by 6 characters [0-9,a-f,A-F]).
        Parameters:
        aHexString - the hex string value of the font (starts with a '#' and ends with 6 characters [0-9,a-f,A-F])
        Returns:
        the first color with the corresponding hex string, or null if no color matches

      • getColorByHtmlHexValue

        Node getColorByHtmlHexValue(String aHexString,
                            Node aDefaultValue)
        Gets the color with a given html hex value (i.e. a '#' followed by 6 characters [0-9,a-f,A-F]) with a fallback value if no color matches.
        Parameters:
        aHexString - the hex string value of the font (starts with a '#' and ends with 6 characters [0-9,a-f,A-F])
        aDefaultValue - fallback value
        Returns:
        the first color with the corresponding hex string, or aDefaultValue if no color matches

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
